name: Elementals (itch) (Glitched Studios)
description:
This is a game that I made with RPG maker MZ instead of MV. It is planned to be a free-roam/sandbox game, and you can do quite a lot already. At the moment only a Demo is released for the public.

The final game will be completely free! Just like the demo.



In this game, you can make choices. Hundreds of choices, you can choose your starting magic element or you could settle down and make a nice home. Or you could just rob everyone in the game and become the richest of all. Possibilities are endless
(possibilities aren't endless in the demo as the demo only has a small portion of the features of the full game.)
